TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi RibbonTextBox extends System.Windows.Controls.TextBox implements class System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource

Docs.summary: Represents a text box that is used in a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following illustration shows examples of RibbonTextBox controls in large, medium, and small variations, and with no images.
![Ribbon text box controls](~/add/media/wpfribbon-textbox.png "Ribbon text box controls") Ribbon text box controls
## Examples The following example shows the markup to create a RibbonTextBoxcontrol with a large image, a small image, and a label.
[!code-xml[Ribbon_ControlsSample#RibbonTextBox](~/add/codesnippet/Xaml/ribboncontrolssample/mainwindow.xaml#ribbontextbox)]

Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for the control.
Docs.value: The keyboard shortcut for the control. The registered default is . For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](../Topic/Dependency%20Property%20Value%20Precedence.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks A KeyTip must be from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key. ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnApplyTemplate() cil managed

Docs.summary: Builds the visual tree for the when a new template is applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is invoked whenever application code or an internal process, such as a rebuilding layout pass, calls the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ApplyTemplate%2A> method.

Docs.summary: Creates a new object for this control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnGotKeyboardFocus(class System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs e) cil managed

Docs.summary: Provides class handling for the event and enables the keyboard focus visual when this control gets keyboard focus.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method overrides the default behavior and enables the keyboard focus visual when this control gets keyboard focus.
This implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.GotKeyboardFocus> event data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnKeyDown(class System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs e) cil managed

Docs.summary: Provides class handling for the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnKeyTipAccessed(class System.Windows.Controls.KeyTipAccessedEventArgs e) cil managed

Docs.summary: Called when the KeyTip or accelerator key is accessed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnLostKeyboardFocus(class System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs e) cil managed

Docs.summary: Provides class handling for the event and disables the keyboard focus visual when this control loses keyboard focus.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method overrides the default behavior and disables the keyboard focus visual when this control loses keyboard focus.
This implementation does not change the handled state (the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property) of the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus> event data.
